mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.`ticket_is_valid` FROM `JC_SEAT` AS a JOIN `JC_TICKET` AS b ON CONCAT(a.seat_row, a.seat_column) = b.ticket_seat WHERE a.`seat_theater_no`=#{seat_theater_no} AND a.`seat_screen_no`=#{seat_screen_no} AND b.`ticket_screen_no`=#{seat_screen_no} AND b.`ticket_movie_no`=#{ticket_movie_no} AND b.`ticket_movie_date`=#{ticket_movie_date} AND b.`ticket_round_view`=#{ticket_round_view};
